local_intent: Execute a top grasp at the precomputed goal_pose with a brief approach/align, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: goal_pose has been computed for the brown_object and is available on the blackboard
coherence_with_global: Matches the global detect–compute–grasp sequence by requiring PoseAvailable(goal_pose), performing a controlled approach, executing GraspAtPose(top, 3000ms), then confirming IsGraspStable.
